Submitter Information: Olympus Life and Material Science Europa GmbH
Regulation Name(s): Creatine phosphokinase/creatine kinase or isoenzymes test system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Olympus CK-MB Reagent, a system reagent for quantitating CK-MB isoenzyme in serum and plasma using Olympus analyzers
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative determination of Creatine Kinase-MB isoenzyme in human serum and heparinized plasma on Olympus analyzers for aiding in diagnosis and treatment of myocardial infarction and muscle diseases
